footer_welcome_starter_title: ¡Discover iWatch, entertainment platform! With a wide variety of content that rivals the best streaming platforms. Immerse yourself in a world of exciting stories from the comfort of your home!
playlist_title_1: Create, share and enjoy the best
subs_subtitle: Join iWatch and select the subscription that best suits your preferences. Get ready for endless entertainment!
compare_plans_description: iWatch offers three plans to cover your needs: The basic plan, the standard plan, and the premium plan. Compare the features of each one and choose your favorite.
delete_account_inf_1: To delete your iWatch account, go to
txt_1: At iWatch, we are passionate about entertainment and want to provide you with the best experience to enjoy your favorite movies and series. With a wide selection of movies, original series, content reviews, and much more, iWatch is your ultimate destination for online entertainment. Discover what makes us unique and join our community of movie and television lovers.
txt_2: At iWatch, we strive to offer you an exceptional streaming platform that meets all your entertainment needs. Since the launch of our platform, we have been dedicated to providing easy and convenient access to a wide variety of content, from blockbusters to exciting original series. Our team consists of movie and technology enthusiasts committed to continuously enhancing your viewing experience. We take pride in offering an intuitive interface, personalized features, and exceptional customer service to ensure that your time on iWatch is always satisfying. At iWatch, it's not just about watching movies and series, but immersing yourself in a world of exciting stories and unforgettable moments. Join us and discover the power of online entertainment at iWatch.
txt_servicios: At iWatch, we offer a wide range of services to meet your entertainment needs:
txt_li_1: Subscriptions: Access a variety of flexible subscription plans to fit your lifestyle and budget.
txt_li_2: Movies and Series: Explore our extensive library of movies and series, regularly updated with the latest releases and timeless classics.
txt_li_3: Get detailed information about the movies and series available on our platform, with comprehensive reviews to help you make informed decisions about what to watch next.
txt_gracias: Thank you for choosing iWatch as your online entertainment destination. We hope you enjoy exploring our platform and discovering everything we have to offer. Get ready to immerse yourself in a world of exciting stories and unparalleled viewing experiences at iWatch!
v_3: The following terms and conditions govern the use of the services and platforms offered by iWatch. By accessing and using our services, you agree to comply with these terms and conditions. If you do not agree with any of these terms, please do not use our services.
v_5: By using our services, you agree to adhere to the following guidelines:
v_6: Do not use our services in a way that interferes with the proper functioning of the platform.
v_7: Do not attempt to access restricted areas of the platform without authorization.
v_8: Do not use our services for illegal or unauthorized purposes.
v_10: The contents of the platform, including but not limited to texts, graphics, images, videos, logos, and trademarks, are protected by intellectual property laws and belong to iWatch or its licensors. Any reproduction, distribution, or modification of these contents without the prior written consent of iWatch is prohibited.
v_12: In no event shall iWatch be liable to you for direct, indirect, incidental, special, consequential, or punitive damages arising from the use of our services.
v_14: We reserve the right to modify these terms and conditions at any time. You will be notified of significant changes through a notification on the platform or by other appropriate means. Your continued use of our services after such modifications shall constitute your consent to the updated terms and conditions.
v_17: This Privacy Policy sets forth the conditions under which iWatch collects, uses, and protects the personal information of its users. This policy applies to all services and platforms offered by iWatch.
v_19: iWatch collects personal information from its users, including but not limited to:
v_20: Profile information: Name, email address, date of birth, gender, viewing preferences, and other information relevant to personalize the user experience.
v_22: Personal information is collected through various means, including:
v_23: Account Registration: When creating an account on iWatch, users are asked to provide certain personal data.
v_24: Platform Interactions: iWatch collects information about users' interactions with the platform, such as content viewing, searches conducted, and viewing preferences.
v_25: Cookies and Similar Technologies: iWatch uses cookies and other tracking technologies to collect information about user activity on the platform.
v_27: The information collected by iWatch is used for the following purposes:
v_28: Personalization of User Experience: We use profile information to offer personalized content and recommendations.
v_29: Improvement of Our Services: We analyze the collected information to improve our services and provide an optimal user experience.
v_30: Communication with Users: We use contact information provided by users to send service-related communications, such as content updates and account notifications.
v_32: iWatch is committed to protecting the privacy of children. We do not knowingly collect personal information from children under 13 years of age without verifiable consent from their parents or legal guardians. If we discover that we have collected personal information from a child without verifiable consent from their parents, we will take steps to delete such information from our servers.
v_34: In addition to the aforementioned, iWatch may collect additional information from its users in order to improve our services and personalize the user experience. This may include information about the device used to access the platform, user location, and online browsing behavior.
